hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOTT.EOTT_ID, ESUS.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS CREATOR, EOTT.CREATE_TIME, ESUSM.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS MODIFIER, EOTT.MODIFY_TIME, EOTT.REC_VER, EOTT.REC_STATUS, EOTT.TIME_ZONE, EOTT.COMPANY_CODE, EOTT.SITE_CODE, EOTT.EOTT_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOTT.EOTT_DATE, EOTT.EOTT_TRACER, EOTT.EOTT_LOCATION, EOTT.EOTT_TEMPERATURE, EOTT.EOTT_HUMIDITY, EOTT.EOTT_IS_ABNORMAL, EOTT.EOTT_TRACKING_WAY, EOTT.EOTT_TRACKING_SITE_CODE, EOTT.EOTT_REMARK, EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR1, EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR2, EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR3, EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR4, EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR5, EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR6, EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR8, EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR7, EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE1, EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE2, EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE5, EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE4, EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE3, EOTT.EOTT_SUBNUM1, EOTT.EOTT_SUBNUM2, EOTT.EOTT_SUBNUM3, EOTT.EOTT_LONGITUDE, EOTT.EOTT_LATITUDE FROM EO_TRANSIT_TRACKING EOTT LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUS ON EOTT.CREATOR=TO_CHAR(ESUS.ESUS_ID) LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUSM ON EOTT.MODIFIER=ESUSM.ESUS_ID WHERE 1=1 <<AND EOTT.EOTT_ID LIKE :eottId>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR1 IN (:substr1Ids)>> <<AND EOTT.CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND EOTT.CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND EOTT.CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND EOTT.MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND EOTT.MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND EOTT.MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND EOTT.REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND EOTT.REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND EOTT.TIME_ZONE LIKE :timeZone>> <<AND EOTT.COMPANY_CODE LIKE :companyCode>> <<AND EOTT.SITE_CODE LIKE :siteCode>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_WORK_ORDER_NO LIKE :eottWorkOrderNo>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_DATE > :eottDateFrom>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_DATE <= :eottDateTo + 1>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_TRACER LIKE :eottTracer>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_LOCATION LIKE :eottLocation>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_TEMPERATURE LIKE :eottTemperature>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_HUMIDITY LIKE :eottHumidity>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_IS_ABNORMAL LIKE :eottIsAbnormal>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_TRACKING_WAY LIKE :eottTrackingWay>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_TRACKING_SITE_CODE LIKE :eottTrackingSiteCode>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_REMARK LIKE :eottRemark>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR1 LIKE :eottSubstr1>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR2 LIKE :eottSubstr2>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR3 LIKE :eottSubstr3>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR4 LIKE :eottSubstr4>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR5 LIKE :eottSubstr5>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR6 LIKE :eottSubstr6>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR8 LIKE :eottSubstr8>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBSTR7 LIKE :eottSubstr7>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE1 > :eottSubdate1From>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE1 <= :eottSubdate1To + 1>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE2 > :eottSubdate2From>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE2 <= :eottSubdate2To + 1>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE5 > :eottSubdate5From>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE5 <= :eottSubdate5To + 1>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE4 > :eottSubdate4From>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE4 <= :eottSubdate4To + 1>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE3 > :eottSubdate3From>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBDATE3 <= :eottSubdate3To + 1>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBNUM1 LIKE :eottSubnum1>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBNUM2 LIKE :eottSubnum2>> <<AND EOTT.EOTT_SUBNUM3 LIKE :eottSubnum3>> ORDER BY EOTT.EOTT_DATE DESC
